Class GuessNumber

  • java.lang.Object
    • MiniGame
      • GuessNumber

  • public class GuessNumber
extends MiniGame
    Instances of GuessNumber represent a type of minigame the player plays against villains. Instances are created when a villain choses to play Guess the Number.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private int DEFAULT_GUESSES
      The default number of guesses received by the hero (without power-ups or special abilities).
      private int guess
      The value of the most recent guess made by the user.
      private int guessesLeft
      The number of remaining guesses the hero has.
      static int MAX_NUMBER
      The upper limit of the number to be guessed.
      private int numberToGuess
      The number which the hero is trying to guess.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      GuessNumber(Hero hero, Villain villain)
      Constructor for a new Guess the Number game.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getGuess()
      Getter method for guess.
      int getGuessesLeft()
      Getter method for guessesLeft.
      int getNumberToGuess()
      Getter method for numberToGuess.
      void guess(int guess)
      Takes a player's guess and sets the minigame as won if the guess matches the villain's number.
      private int initialGuesses()
      Calculates the initial number of guesses the hero has as follows: -default number is given by DEFAULT_GUESSES -one extra guess if the hero has the battle advantage special ability -one extra guess for each ExtraGuess power-up currently applied to the hero
      private int numberToGuess()
      Chooses a random number between 1 and MAX_NUMBER_TO_BE_GUESSED inclusive.
      int numExtraGuesses()
      Returns the number of extra guess power ups applied to the hero playing the game.

    • Field Detail

      • MAX_NUMBER

        public static final int MAX_NUMBER
        The upper limit of the number to be guessed. The number to be guessed will be between 1 and MAX_NUMBER inclusive.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • DEFAULT_GUESSES

        private final int DEFAULT_GUESSES
        The default number of guesses received by the hero (without power-ups or special abilities).
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • numberToGuess

        private int numberToGuess
        The number which the hero is trying to guess. Initialised to a random number between 1 and 10 inclusive.

      • guessesLeft

        private int guessesLeft
        The number of remaining guesses the hero has.

      • guess

        private int guess
        The value of the most recent guess made by the user.

    • Constructor Detail

      • GuessNumber

        public GuessNumber(Hero hero,
                   Villain villain)
        Constructor for a new Guess the Number game. Initialises guessesLeft to the appropriate value.
        Parameters:
        hero - The hero playing the game.
        villain - The villain playing the game.

    • Method Detail

      • guess

        public void guess(int guess)
        Takes a player's guess and sets the minigame as won if the guess matches the villain's number. Otherwise, decrements the number of guesses the player has remaining.
        Parameters:
        guess - The player's guess.

      • numExtraGuesses

        public int numExtraGuesses()
        Returns the number of extra guess power ups applied to the hero playing the game.
        Returns:
        The number of extra guess power ups applied to the hero.

      • initialGuesses

        private int initialGuesses()
        Calculates the initial number of guesses the hero has as follows: -default number is given by DEFAULT_GUESSES -one extra guess if the hero has the battle advantage special ability -one extra guess for each ExtraGuess power-up currently applied to the hero
        Returns:
        The initial number of guesses the hero has.

      • numberToGuess

        private int numberToGuess()
        Chooses a random number between 1 and MAX_NUMBER_TO_BE_GUESSED inclusive.
        Returns:
        The random number.

      • getNumberToGuess

        public int getNumberToGuess()
        Getter method for numberToGuess.
        Returns:
        The value of numberToGuess.

      • getGuessesLeft

        public int getGuessesLeft()
        Getter method for guessesLeft.
        Returns:
        The value of guessesLeft.

      • getGuess

        public int getGuess()
        Getter method for guess.
        Returns:
        The value of guess.
